summary: FrogProfilePage adds a leftmost Back button with history-based navigation and fallback to '/', addressing placement and behavior. However, the Back control appears icon-only (no visible "Back" text), so it does not fully match the Lily page Back button styling requirement (icon + label). Also, non-requested meta/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Match the Frog Profile Back button visual styling to the existing Lily page Back button (icon + “Back” label, muted foreground, hover state, rounded hit area) while keeping all user-facing text in English.
missing_requirements.reason: The Back button in FrogProfilePage renders only an ArrowLeft icon with an aria-label; there is no visible “Back” label text shown alongside the icon, which is explicitly required.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository meta/state tracking files unrelated to the Frog Profile back button fix (project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints ask to keep changes scoped to fixing the Frog Profile page back button placement and behavior; updating project state metadata is not requested by any REQ.
Not requested by any requirement; outside the scoped UI fix for FrogProfilePage back button.
